document.full_text: two bombs exploded near a crowded market in the iraqi city of falluja on monday, killing six people and injuring two dozen, while two roadside bombs in diyala province killed 10, security and hospital sources said.
document.title: nineteen killed, dozens wounded in iraq bombings
lines_and_colors: two bombs exploded near a crowded market in the iraqi city of falluja on monday, killing six people and injuring two dozen, while two roadside bombs in diyala province killed 10, security and hospital sources said.
